sys_hub_flow.name: Stolen Hardware

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Create Incident for the Hardware team

sys_element_mapping.value: short_description=Hardware {{Updated_1.current.display_name}} has been reported stolen. Determine follow-up steps needed, including drive wipe.^assignment_group={"display":"Hardware","value":"8a5055c9c61122780043563ef53438e3"}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Create Security Incident
Notify insurance provider
Identify software installed on the stolen hardware
Run remote wipe
Order new hardware to replace stolen hardware
